name: Muc-Off Concentrated Nano Tech Gel Bike Cleaner
categories: Concentrated Nano Tech Gel Bike Cleaner
description: Clean bikes work better! This is a cost effective cleaner for your bike or bikes. This easy to use cleaner is biodegradable and fast-acting.Carefully balanced formula removes grime without damaging your bike's finish.Mix 1 part gel with 3 parts water for spray cleaner.Use undiluted as a degreaser.Alkaline based solution is free of acids, CFC and solvents.Safe on all types of bike and surfaces, including disc brake rotors and pads.
